name: spectrum-vanilla
description: The Spectrum Colorpicker with Vanilla JS

scripts.build:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack && cross-env NODE_ENV=production LIB_TARGET=module webpack
scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack && cross-env NODE_ENV=development LIB_TARGET=module webpack
scripts.build:i18n: cp -r src/i18n dist && cp -r src/i18n-es dist
scripts.build:css:prod: node-sass --output-style compressed src/spectrum.scss dist/spectrum.min.css && node-sass --output-style compressed src/spectrum-dark.scss dist/spectrum-dark.min.css
scripts.build:css: node-sass --source-map true src/spectrum.scss dist/spectrum.css && node-sass --source-map true src/spectrum-dark.scss dist/spectrum-dark.css
